com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
Class MetaioCloudViewActivity

java.lang.Object
  MapActivity
      com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.MetaioCloudViewActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetaioCloudARViewActivity
public abstract class MetaioCloudViewActivity
extends MapActivity
implements SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback

Base class for junaio views (AR, Map or List).

It provides functionalities to search POIs, send POIs' events, refresh channel (based on timer, location change or filters).

Field Summary
protected  MetaioWorldChannel mChannel
          Currently viewing channel
protected  boolean mInvalidateAll
          Invalidate all loaded geometries, if true, all geometries will be removed, and loaded in next rendering cycle based on mPOIs if in GPS-Compass tracking mode, else fixed marker objects are loaded
protected  boolean mInvalidated
          true when the view is invalidated
protected static LLACoordinate mLastSearchedLLA
          LLA from where last pois/search was done
protected  Lock mLockDataSource
          Mutex to lock all accesses to JunaioDataSource and POIManager
protected static boolean mShowChannelFilter
          true if channel filter should be displayed onStart

protected boolean mInvalidateAll
Invalidate all loaded geometries, if true, all geometries will be removed, and loaded in next rendering cycle based on mPOIs if in GPS-Compass tracking mode, else fixed marker objects are loaded

public void onGravitySensorChanged(float[] event)
Description copied from interface: SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
Called when gravity (accelerometer) sensor provide new reading at regular interval

Description copied from interface: SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
Called when heading sensor provide new reading at regular interval

Specified by:
onHeadingSensorChanged in interface SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
Parameters:
event - Vector containing orientation reading, x=azimuth, y=pitch, z=roll

showToast

protected void showToast(String message)
Show toast message. AR view will need to override this in order to take care of orientation changes

Parameters:
message - Message to be displayed

showAlert

protected void showAlert(String message)

invalidateAll

protected void invalidateAll()
Invalidate the view

updateGUI

protected abstract void updateGUI()
Update GUI with respect to current channel.

This is called when new channel details are available. The activity should update any GUI that is related to the channel type or contents, e.g. update channel name, icon etc.

showChannelFilter

protected abstract void showChannelFilter()
Show channel filter, should be implemented by the derived class

showProgress

protected abstract void showProgress(boolean show)
Show progress.

This method is called whenever a background process is started or stopped. Note that is may be called from non GUI thread, so any GUI handling should be done in GUI thread, i.e. Activity.runOnUiThread

Parameters:
show - true to show, or false to hide progress

showProgressBar

protected abstract void showProgressBar(float progress,
                                        boolean show)
Show progress bar.

This method is called whenever a POI has been loaded. Note that is may be called from non GUI thread, so any GUI handling should be done in GUI thread, i.e. Activity.runOnUiThread

Parameters:
progress - float between 0.0 and 1.0, determines the progress of the bunch of pois
show - true to show, or false to hide progress

setChannel

protected void setChannel(int channelID)
Set channel to be viewed. This will first download channel detail information and then on success it will search POIs. The existing POIs will be removed before performing search.

Parameters:
channelID - Channel ID to view

searchPOIs

@Deprecated
protected void searchPOIs()
Deprecated. 

Deprecated, use reloadPOIs() instead

reloadPOIs

protected void reloadPOIs()
Dispatches pois/search request the client using current channel
